title: Adams Lake Ferry
description: Adams Lake Ferry. There will be required maintenance between the start of Adams Lake Ferry and Adams Lake Ferry (Adams Lake). Starting Fri Nov 15 at 1:00 AM PST. Ferry route will be closed. Next update time Fri Nov 15 at 5:00 AM PST. Last updated Tue Nov 12 at 10:48 AM PST. (DBC-70167)
Description: There will be required maintenance between the start of Adams Lake Ferry and Adams Lake Ferry (Adams Lake). Ferry route will be closed.

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Bridge construction at Nicomen River Rd (14 km east of Lytton). Until Sat Nov 30. Watch for traffic control. Expect delays. Speed reduced to 30 km/h. Highway stoppages with expected delays of 15 minutes. Project completion: 30 November 2024. Next update time Fri Nov 29 at 3:00 PM PDT. Last updated Fri Oct 25 at 5:08 AM PDT. (DBC-56391)
Location: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions at Nicomen River Rd (14 km east of Lytton)
Description: Bridge construction. Watch for traffic control. Expect delays. Speed reduced to 30 km/h. Highway stoppages with expected delays of 15 minutes.

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Construction work between Coburn St and Shuswap Ave for 0.7 km (Chase). From 7:00 AM to 5:00 PM PDT on weekdays and Saturday. Blasting. Road closed intermittently. Watch for traffic control. Speed reduction to 60km/hr. Next update time Mon Nov 25 at 10:00 AM PDT. Last updated Mon Oct 21 at 10:28 AM PDT. (DBC-64961)
Location: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), between Coburn St and Shuswap Ave for 0.7 km (Chase)
Description: Construction work, blasting. Road closed intermittently. Watch for traffic control. Speed reduction to 60km/hr.

title: Highway 1
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway). Road construction work between Illecillewaet Brake Check and MacDonald Snowshed for 3.0 km (5 to 2 km west of West Boundary of Glacier National Park). Until Sat Nov 23. 2-hour closure from 6:00am-8:00am and 30-minute closures from 8:00am-6:00pm daily. Emergency vehicle access open. Next update time Sat Nov 23 at 6:00 PM PST. Last updated Fri Nov 8 at 4:02 PM PST. (DBC-68375)

title: Highway 101 Both Directions
description: Highway 101, in both directions. Special event planned between Alberni St and Duncan St for 0.9 km (Powell River). Starting Sun Dec 1 at 2:00 PM PDT until Sun Dec 1 at 5:00 PM PDT. Road closure planned. The annual Santa Claus Parade will be taking place. Next update time Sun Dec 1 at 5:00 PM PDT. Last updated Fri Oct 25 at 12:04 PM PDT. (DBC-69604)
Location: Highway 101, in both directions between Alberni St and Duncan St for 0.9 km (Powell River)
Description: Road closure planned for the annual Santa Claus Parade

title: Highway 17 Both Directions
description: Highway 17 (Patricia Bay Highway), in both directions. Construction work at Exit 18: Keating Cross Rd (Central Saanich). Until Tue Jul 1, 2025. Nighttime lane closures both directions. Access to Barbara Drive from Keating Cross Road and access to East Saanich, Martindale and Danica from Highway 17 permanently closed. Keating Cross Road southbound onramp to Highway 17 closed. Next update time Sat May 10, 2025 at 12:00 PM PDT. Last updated Thu Sep 26 at 12:08 PM PDT. (DBC-54341)
Location: Highway 17 (Patricia Bay Highway), in both directions at Exit 18: Keating Cross Rd (Central Saanich)
Description: Construction work with nighttime lane closures both directions. Access to Barbara Drive from Keating Cross Road and access to East Saanich, Martindale and Danica from Highway 17 permanently closed. Keating Cross Road southbound onramp to Highway 17 closed.

title: Highway 97 Both Directions
description: Highway 97, in both directions. Landslide between Callan Rd and N Beach Rd for 1.5 km (2 to 1 km north of Summerland). Road open to traffic. Expect delays under 5 minutes. Next update time Fri Nov 22 at 12:30 PM PST. Last updated Wed Nov 13 at 1:14 PM PST. (DBC-55794)

title: Kootenay Lake Ferry
description: Kootenay Lake Ferry. Ferry is out of service between Balfour and Kootenay Bay. Schedule modification due to crewing issue. Monday - Friday Essential Service sailings from Balfour at 6:30AM, 8:10AM, 4:30PM, from Kootenay Bay at 7:10AM, 9AM, 5:20PM. Passage only for Essential Service travelers. All weekend and holiday sailings cancelled. Emergency service sailings accommodated. Next update time Fri Nov 15 at 9:00 AM PST. Last updated Thu Nov 14 at 8:40 AM PST. (DBC-69872)
Description: Ferry is out of service between Balfour and Kootenay Bay due to crewing issue. Essential Service sailings available on weekdays with modified schedule. Passage only for Essential Service travelers. Weekend and holiday sailings cancelled. Emergency service sailings accommodated.

title: Other Roads
description: Johnston Bridge. Travel advisory in effect at Front St. In Quesnel. Johnston Bridge. Bridge is open to vehicles with gross vehicle weight rating of 10,000 kilograms or lower. Industrial traffic and heavy commercial traffic must detour via Plywood Rd and Maple Drive. Industrial traffic is not allowed to detour through Johnston Subdivision. Next update time Wed Apr 8, 2026 at 9:00 AM PDT. Last updated Thu Oct 17 at 6:39 AM PDT. (DBC-47311)
